entry.dcterms:description: the respondents' family environment, level of education, job, position; the level of education, job and housing conditions of the respondent's parents and grandparents; marriage attitudes
entry.dcterms:subject: childbearing, family planning and abortion
family life, marriage, relationship
demography
social welfare policy and systems
gender and gender roles
person
survey data
cross-section
Appr. 1400 engaged couples from the visitors to pre-marriage counseling in Miskolc and Nyíregyháza.
Self-administered questionnaires, and data sheets about the engaged couple filled out by the marriage counselor.
A
